sourceDesc.p:
If Chinese, the text below is based on the Taishō text from the CBETA-Database (Version Feb.2006). If Pāli, the text base is the VRI Chaṭṭa Saṅgāyana edition (ver.3). If Sanskrit the text base is Enomoto, Fumio 榎本文雄 (1994): A comprehensive study of the Chinese Saṃyuktāgama: Indic texts corresponding to the Chinese Saṃyuktāgama as found in the Sarvāstivāda-Mūlasarvāstivāda literature. Kyoto: Kacho Junior College
and other scholarly publications (as referenced). English translations by Marcus Bingenheimer.

projectDesc.p: This file has been created in the project "A Digital Comparative Edition of the Bieyi za ahan jing" conducted at the Chung-hwa Institute for Buddhist Studies 中華佛學研究所 and the Dharma Drum Buddhist College 法鼓佛教研修學院. The project was funded by the Chiang Ching-kuo Foundation for International Scholarly Exchange 蔣經國國際學術交流基金會. The aim of the project was to produce a comparative digital edition and partial translation of the 364 sutras of the BZA and their parallels. In the original interface, the texts were kept in an eXist database and are realized via XQuery and XSLT as HTML for the online user. The project lasted from 2005-2009.

div.head: vinaya vastu
'dul ba gshi
div.p: From the Derge edition. Derge 001. This is part of the text-cluster of BZA (T.100) sutra 205.
rgyal po'i khab tu byon nas de'i tshe kun du rgyu khri'u brtsegs zhes bya ba ma ga nghā bzang mo'i rdzing gi 'gram na gnas te/ de mtshan mo mchil pas nya bshor cing za bar byed do//
de nam langs nas ni khri'u steng du khri'u bzhag pa la 'dug nas tshigs su bcad pas smra ste/

lg.l: chos kyi chos mchog gis 'tsho srog chags dag// 'ga' la yang 'tshe mi byed dge slong 'gyur//
zhi ba'i yid kyis spong dang brtul zhugs spyad// dul ba de ni zhi ba'i rjes su mthun//

div.p: bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i gdul ba'i dus mkhyen nas de'i drung du gshegs te bka'/ stsal pa//

lg.l: tshigs bcad de ni ji lta bar// gal te khyod kyang de 'dra na//
khyod kyang dam par brtsi ra rung na// spong ba khyod ni de mi 'dra//
re zhig nye bar zhi zhing dul ba dang// srog chags 'ga' la 'ang 'tshe bar ma byed par//
zhi ba'i yid kyis spong dang brtul zhugs spyod// dul ba de ni zhi ba'i rjes su mthun//
gang la lus dang ngag dang yid kyis ni// nyes par byas pa yod pa ma yin la//
gang zhig gnas gsum dag gis bsdams gyur pa// dul ba de ni zhi ba'i rjes su mthun//

div.p: de nas kun du rgyu khri'u brtsegs kyis bsams pa/ dge sbyong gau ta ma'i thugs kyis ni bdag gi sems mkhyen to snyam du rig nas mngon par dad par gyur to//

de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang/ bag la nyal dang/ khams dang/ rang bzhin mkhyen nas de dang mthun pa'i 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi so sor rtogs par 'gyur ba'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/ thos pas kun du rgyu khri'u brtsegs zhes bya ba nas thog ma med pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so//
